macro_context: Contrarian bullish setup: Fear & Greed at 9 (Extreme Fear - historically bullish reversal signal), Daily RSI at 38.0 (oversold), price near Bollinger lower band (1965.91). EMA 12 crossing above EMA 26 suggesting momentum shifting bullish. ETH rejected from $2015 area, now consolidating near support. On-chain stale so reducing confidence. Using $15 at 3x for $45 exposure with tight SL at 1960.
